support_text: Supports [Attack|Attacks], causing them to [Gain] [Fire] Damage but deal less [Cold] and [Lightning] Damage.
Supports [Attack|Attacks], causing them to [Attack] faster.
Supports [Projectile|Projectile] skills, making them fire extra [Projectile|Projectiles]. Also lowers [Attack] and Cast speed of supported skills, as well as lessening their damage.
Supports [Projectile|Projectile] skills, making those [Projectile|Projectiles] travel faster.
Supports [Attack|Attacks], causing them to [Gain] [Cold] Damage but deal less [Fire] and [Lightning] Damage.
Supports [Attack|Attacks], causing them to gain [Accuracy].
Supports any skill with an area of effect, making it larger.
Supports [Attack|Attacks], causing them to [Gain] [Lightning] Damage but deal less [Cold] and [Fire] Damage.
Supports any skill, making it cost less to use. Cannot support skills which reserve [Spirit].
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing it to deal more damage with [Critical|Critical Hits] but have less [Critical|Critical Hit] chance.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing it to [Knockback|Knock Back] enemies.
Supports [Attack|Attacks], causing their [Physical] damage to [LifeLeech|Leech] Life.
Supports [Attack|Attacks], causing their [Physical] damage to [ManaLeech|Leech] Mana.
Supports [Attack|Attacks], causing them to [Gain] [Chaos] Damage but deal less Damage of other [DamageTypes|Types].
Supports [Projectile|Projectile] skills, making their [Projectile|Projectiles] [Pierce|Pierce] an enemy but deal less damage after doing so.
Supports [Melee] [Attack|Attacks], boosting their [Physical] damage at the cost of [Attack] Speed.
Supports [Spell|Spells], causing them to cast faster.
Supports any skill with an area of effect, causing that area to be smaller but any area damage it deals to be higher.
Supports [Melee] [Attack|Attacks], causing them to deal more damage against [Bleeding] enemies, but preventing them from inflicting [Bleeding].
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing them to [Blind|Blind] on [HitDamage|Hit].
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, making those [HitDamage|Hits] [Penetration|Penetrate] enemy [Fire|Fire] resistance.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, making those [HitDamage|Hits] [Penetration|Penetrate] enemy [Cold|Cold] resistance.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, making those [HitDamage|Hits] [Penetration|Penetrate] enemy [Lightning|Lightning] resistance.
Supports [Projectile|Projectile] skills and any other skills that [Chain|Chain], causing them to [Chain|Chain] additional times.
Supports [Projectile] skills, making their [Projectile|Projectiles] [Fork].

Supports [Spell|Spells] that affect an area around you or a target location. Supported [Spell|Spells] echo, causing their effects to happen again after a short delay. Cannot support [Channelling] skills or [Remote] skills.
Supports skills which create [Minion|Minions], bolstering the Elemental [Resistances] of those [Minion|Minions].
Supports [Projectile|Projectile] skills, making those [Projectile|Projectiles] travel more slowly.
Supports [Attack|Attacks] you use yourself. [Freeze|Freezing] an enemy with supported skills infuses all of your [Attack|Attacks] with [Cold] damage for a short time.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, making it more effective at [Freeze|Freezing] enemies.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, making it more likely to [Shock].
Supports [Spell|Spells] that [HitDamage|Hit] enemies, boosting their damage but preventing them from dealing [Critical|Critical Hits].
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing it to deal more [ElementalDamage|Elemental Damage] but be unable to inflict [ElementalAilments|Elemental Ailments].
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, [AilmentSpread|Spreading] [Ignite|Ignites] it inflicts to nearby enemies after a delay.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, giving it a chance to inflict [Bleeding].
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, giving it a chance to [Poison|Poison] enemies.
Supports [Attack|Attacks], causing them to [Maim|Maim] enemies.
Supports [Attack|Attacks], granting them extra [Fire] damage against [Ignite|Ignited] enemies but making them unable to [Ignite] enemies themselves.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies or inflicts [Shock], causing its [Shock|Shocks] to be inflicted less often but last longer.
Supports any skill that deals damage, boosting its [Physical] damage at the expense of all other [DamageTypes|Damage Types].
Supports any damaging skill that you use yourself, causing it to deal more damage if you move a sufficient distance while using the skill. Teleportation does not count towards the distance travelled.
Supports [Spell|Spells] you cast yourself, tracking the mana you spend to cast them. Spending enough mana grants a burst of Mana Regeneration and Cast Speed.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, giving it a chance to [Withered|Wither] enemies on [HitDamage|Hit].
Supports [Spell|Spells] you cast yourself, making their effect reoccur when cast. Cannot support [Channelling] Skills or Skills with a Cooldown.
Supports [Attack|Attacks], causing them to deal more damage to enemies based on how close they are to you.
Supports [Melee|Melee] [Attack|Attacks], causing them to grant [Rage|Rage] on [HitDamage|Hit].
Supports skills which create [Minion|Minions], making them deal and take more damage.
Supports skills which create [Minion|Minions], granting them more life but making them deal less damage.
Supports skills which create [Minion|Minions], causing them and enemies near them to [Burning|Burn]. Damage dealt by the [Burning] is based off the Life of the supported [Minion].

Supports skills with cooldowns, giving them extra uses of that cooldown.
Cannot support instant or triggered skills.
Supports [Curse] skills you cast yourself, causing them to trigger Doom Blast on [Curse|Cursed] enemies when the [Curse] expires.
Supports any Skill, turning a portion of its Mana cost into a Life cost. Does not support Skills which reserve [Spirit].
Supports [Strike] skills, causing them to steal [MonsterModifiers|Modifiers] from [Rarity|Rare] monsters they kill.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing it to deal more damage against enemies on [LowLife|Low Life].
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, making its [Shock|Shocks] more effective but last for a shorter duration.
Supports [Slam|Slam] skills, granting them a chance to create patches of [JaggedGround|Jagged Ground].
Supports any skill you use yourself that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing it to accumulate [Critical|Critical Hit] chance over time.
Supports [Attack|Attacks], causing repeated uses to be more effective at [Stun|Stunning] enemies.
Supports any skill that has a duration, making that duration shorter.
Supports [Slam|Slams] you use yourself, providing a powerful [AncestralBoost|Ancestral Boost] every few seconds.
Supports any skill that you can use, making you harder to [Stun] while using it.
Supports any skill that has a duration, making that duration longer.
Supports [Melee|Melee] [Strike|Strike] skills, causing them to create an [Aftershock] that damages enemies around the target when they [HeavyStun|Heavy Stun] an enemy.
Supports [Curse|Curses], spreading their effects when a [Curse|Cursed] enemy dies.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing it to create patches of [ChilledGround|Chilled Ground] around [Frozen|Frozen] enemies.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing it to create a chilling vortex on [Shatter|Shattering] an enemy.

Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing you to regenerate mana on [Shock|shocking] an enemy. Cannot support skills which create [Minion|Minions], or skills used by [Totem|Totems] or [Trap|Traps].
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing you to recover [EnergyShield|Energy Shield] when it kills a [Shock|Shocked] enemy.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, giving it a chance to also [Shock|Shock] nearby enemies when you [Shock|Shock] an enemy.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing [Freeze] it inflicts to last longer.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, making it more likely to [Ignite].
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing inflicted [Ignite|Ignites] to deal more damage but its [HitDamage|Hits] to deal less damage.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing its [Ignite|Ignites] to be inflicted less often but last longer.

Supports [Spell] skills, causing them to reduce the cast time of other skills when used. Cannot support [Totem] skills, [Channelling] skills, [Trigger|Triggering] skills, instant skills, or skills with a [Reservation].

Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing them to deal more Damage against enemies with [ArmourBreak|Broken Armour] but preventing them from [ArmourBreak|Breaking Armour] themselves. Cannot support skills that [Consume|Consume] [ArmourBreak|Broken Armour].
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing them to apply [ArmourBreak|Broken Armour] to enemies when causing a [HeavyStun|Heavy Stun] to enemies.
Supports [Warcry|Warcries], causing them to consume [Rage] to further boost [Empowered] [Attack|Attacks].
Supports any skill that hits enemies, causing them to [Chill] enemies near enemies they [Freeze].

Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies. Nearby enemies are marked when they are [PrimedElectrocution|Primed for Electrocution], and hitting a marked enemy with a supported skill will [Electrocute] them.
Supports any skill that hits enemies, causing it to [Critical|Critically Hit] less often but deal more damage with Critical Hits.
Supports skills that consume [Charges|Power, Frenzy or Endurance Charges] on use, giving them a chance not to remove each [Charges|Charge] while still gaining the benefits of consuming them.

Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing [Poison] it applies to also [ArmourBreak|Break] enemy [Armour|Armour]. Cannot support skills that [Consume] [ArmourBreak|Fully Broken] [Armour].
Supports skills that can [Poison|Poison] enemies, causing [Poison|Poisoned] enemies to gain Plague over time and explode in a Plague Burst on death. Cannot support the skills of [Minion|Minions].
Supports skills that create walls in a line, causing them to be created in a circle instead but deal less [HitDamage|Hit] damage.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing it to [Consume|Consume] [Freeze] on [Ignite|Igniting] a [Frozen] enemy to boost the effect of the [Ignite].
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, prolonging [Shock|Shocks] they inflict on [Ignite|Ignited] enemies.
Supports skills which can have a [Limit|Limited] number of effects active at once, increasing that [Limit] at the cost of their duration. Only applies to restrictions that use the word "[Limit]".
Supports any Skill which can deal Damage. [Lightning] Damage from Supported Skills can inflict [Electrocute], but Supported Skills cannot inflict [Shock].
Supports any skill that you can use, causing [EnergyShield|Energy Shield] recharge to begin immediately if you are [Stun|Stunned] while using it.
Supports any skill that you can use, triggering a blast of wind that [Knockback|Knocks Back] enemies if you are [Stun|Stunned] while using it.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing them to deal more damage to [Frozen] enemies but consume their [Freeze]. Cannot support skills that [Consume|Consume] [Freeze|Freeze].

Supports any [Spell] that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing it to consume [ElementalAilments|Elemental Ailments] on hit to trigger an Elemental Discharge. Cannot support the skills of [Minion|Minions].
Supports any damaging skill that you use yourself, causing it to deal significantly more damage but gain a long cooldown. Cannot support Skills which already have a cooldown.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing enemies it [Ignite|Ignites] to have a chance to explode on death.
Supports Herald Skills, making their triggered effects deal more damage at the expense of their [Persistent] buffs.
Supports [Persistent] [Buff] Skills, making the [Buff] they grant more powerful.

Supports any [Spell] that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing it to trigger a Mana Flare on [Critical|Critical Hit]. The Mana Flare consumes your Mana to deal [Fire] damage. Cannot support the skills of [Minion|Minions].
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing any [Pinned|Pin] buildup it inflicts to be stronger the closer the enemy is to you.
Supports any skill that hits enemies, causing it to build up [Stun|Stun] more quickly.
Supports skills that can be used while moving, allowing you to move faster while using them.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, allowing its [Physical] damage to [Pinned|Pin] enemies but making it unable to [Stun].
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, making it more likely to [Critical|Critically Hit] enemies on full life.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing enemies it kills to grant more Mana Flask charges.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing enemies it kills to grant more Life Flask charges.
Supports skills which create [Minion|Minions], causing them to violently explode when reduced to [LowLife|Low Life].
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, giving it a chance to gain an [Charges|Endurance Charge] when it [ArmourBreak|Fully Breaks] an enemy's [Armour].
Supports [Curse] Skills, magnifying their power.
Supports skills that consume [Corpse|Corpses], giving them a chance to take effect without destroying the [Corpse].
Supports [Curse] skills. Cursed enemies' bodies decay, taking [Chaos] damage over time.
Supports [Curse] skills, causing them to [Curse] enemies more quickly after being cast.
Supports [Curse] skills, causing them to cover a larger area but take longer to [Curse] enemies.

Supports damaging skills you use yourself, draining the life from one of your [Minion|Minions] on use in order to boost the skill's damage. Only takes effect if you have a [Minion] with enough life to drain the full amount.
Supports skills that create [Persistent] [Minion|Minions], causing those [Minion|Minions] to fight on for a short duration before dying when they are fatally wounded.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing you to recover Life when it [CullingStrike|Culls] an enemy.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing you to recover Mana when it [CullingStrike|Culls] an enemy.
Supports [Attack|Attacks] you use yourself. Killing a [Shock|Shocked] enemy with supported skills infuses all of your [Attack|Attacks] with [Lightning] damage for a short time.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, allowing it to inflict an extra [Poison] on enemies but shortening the duration of those [Poison|Poisons].
Supports skills that can generate [Charges], giving them a chance to generate an additional [Charges|Charge] when they do so.
Supports skills that can [Empowered|Empower] skills other than themselves, causing skills they [Empowered|Empower] to deal more damage.
Supports skills that can [Empowered|Empower] skills other than themselves, causing skills they [Empowered|Empower] to [CullingStrike|Cull] enemies.
Supports [Warcry] skills, causing them to grant you [Rage] on use depending on counted monster [Power].
Supports any skill, causing [ArmourBreak|Armour Break] it inflicts to be stronger.
Supports any damaging skill that you use or trigger yourself, causing it to consume [Rage] to deal more damage. If you don't have enough [Rage] to consume, the damage bonus will not apply.
Supports [Attack|Attacks], causing them to trigger a [Fire|Fiery] explosion when they [ArmourBreak|Fully Break] an enemy's [Armour].
Supports [Travel] skills, causing your footsteps to crack the earth and emit damaging shockwaves while using the skill.
Supports [Strike|Strikes] that perform a [FinalStrike|Final Strike] at the end of a combination of attacks, allowing you to use the [FinalStrike|Final Strike] twice in succession.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing it to inflict [Exposure|Fire Exposure] when it [Ignite|Ignites] an enemy.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing it to inflict [Exposure|Lightning Exposure] when it [Shock|Shocks] an enemy.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing it to inflict [Exposure|Cold Exposure] when it [Critical|Critically Hits] an enemy.
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing it to deal less damage but inflict more potent [Poison].
Supports any skill that [HitDamage|Hits] enemies, causing it to deal less damage but inflict more potent [Bleeding].
Supports [Warcry|Warcries], causing them to inflict [CorruptedBlood|Corrupted Blood] on enemies in their area of effect.

Supports [Channelling] skills that have special effects if released with [PerfectTiming|Perfect Timing], causing them to deal much more damage if released with [PerfectTiming|Perfect Timing] but reducing the [PerfectTiming|Perfect Timing] window.
Supports [Fire] skills, granting them an additional level.
Supports [Cold] skills, granting them an additional level.
Supports [Lightning] skills, granting them an additional level.
Supports [Chaos] skills, granting them an additional level.
Supports [Physical] skills, granting them an additional level.
Supports [Minion] skills, granting them an additional level.
Supports any skill that deals damage, causing it to deal more damage over time but have a shorter duration.

Supports [Spell|Spells] that deal non-[Ailments|Ailment] damage over time, causing them to have a shorter duration but deal substantially more damage over time with [Debuff|Debuffs] inflicted against enemies on full life.

Supports [Spell|Spells] that deal non-[Ailments|Ailment] damage over time, causing them to consume [Ailments] on enemies it applies damage over time [Debuff|Debuffs] to in order to deal substantially more damage over time.

Supports [Spell|Spells] that deal non-[Ailments|Ailment] [Chaos] damage over time. Enemies taking damage over time from [Debuff|Debuffs] caused by supported skills will suffer [Freeze] build up from [Chaos] damage [HitDamage|Hits] from any source.
Supports [Spell|Spells] that deal non-[Ailments|Ailment] [Chaos] damage over time, causing damage over time they inflict to also [Hinder] enemies.

Supports [Melee|Melee] [Attack|Attacks] you use yourself. Supported Skills cannot be used until enough [Combo|Combo] has been built up, but deal massively more damage. Cannot support skills which already [Combo|Combo], or [Trigger|Triggered] Skills.
Supports any skill, causing inflicted [Slow|Slows] to be more powerful.
Supports [Persistent|Persistent] [Buff|Buff] Skills, causing you to gain increased [Accuracy|Accuracy] while the Skill is active.
Supports [Persistent|Persistent] [Buff|Buff] Skills, causing you to gain increased Mana Regeneration while the Skill is active.
Supports [Persistent|Persistent] [Buff|Buff] Skills, causing you to gain Life Regeneration while the Skill is active.
Supports [Persistent|Persistent] [Buff|Buff] Skills, causing you to gain increased Life recovery from [Flask|Flasks] while the Skill is active.
Supports [Persistent|Persistent] [Buff|Buff] Skills, causing you to recover Life on kill while the Skill is active.
Supports skills you use yourself, causing them to trigger a [Chaos|Chaos] Damage nova when breaking Enemy [EnergyShield|Energy Shield].
Supports skills that [HitDamage|Hit] Enemies. Supported skills [Aggravate|Aggravate] [Bleeding|Bleeding] on [HitDamage|Hitting] [HeavyStun|Heavily Stunned] Enemies.
Supports [Attack|Attack] Skills, causing them to [CullingStrike|Cull] [Rarity|Rare and Unique] Enemies on [HitDamage|Hit].

Supports [Spell|Spells] that affect an area around you or a target location, causing those [Spell|Spells] to also target additional areas on either side of the target area, along a randomly chosen axis. Cannot support [Channelling] skills or [Remote] skills.
Supports Skills that [HitDamage|Hit] Enemies, causing those [HitDamage|Hits] to [ArmourBreak|Break Armour] based on a portion of [Physical|Physical Damage] dealt.
Supports [Attack|Attacks], causing them to deal more damage from farther away.
Supports [Attack|Attacks], causing them to build up [Daze|Daze] based on a portion of [Physical|Physical] Damage dealt.
Supports [Attack|Attacks], causing them to [Daze|Daze] Enemies when they fully [ArmourBreak|Break Armour].
Supports [Warcry|Warcries], causing them to [Daze|Daze] Enemies on use.
Supports [Curse] Skills. Supported [Curse] Skills no longer have an activation delay, instead creating areas which [Curse] Enemies so long as they are within them.
Supports [Attack|Attacks] that use a weapon, causing them to deal more weapon [ElementalDamage|Elemental damage].
Supports skills with Cooldowns, increasing the rate at which those [CooldownRecovery|Cooldowns Recover].
Supports Skills which create stationary objects. Objects created by supported Skills generate a Font of Blood, creating an [Aura] which grants Life regeneration.
Supports Skills which create stationary objects. Objects created by supported Skills generate a Font of Mana, creating an [Aura] which grants Mana regeneration.
Supports Skills which create stationary objects. Objects created by supported Skills generate a Font of Rage, creating an [Aura] which grants [Rage] over time, as well as preventing [Rage] loss.
Supports [Slam|Slams] you use yourself, giving them a chance to create an [Aftershock].
Supports Skills that leap into the air, causing them to create [ConsecratedGround|Consecrated Ground] when you land

Supports any Skill which creates [RunicInscription|Runic Inscriptions] when Cast, causing those [RunicInscription|Runic Inscriptions] to trigger Burning Inscription when they expire. Burning Inscription is a [Spell] which creates [IgnitedGround|Ignited Ground] based off of your Maximum Mana.
Supports [Crossbow] [Ammunition] Skills, causing them to load an extra bolt at the cost of reload speed.
Supports [Crossbow] [Ammunition] Skills, causing them to automatically reload when they [HeavyStun|Heavy Stun] an enemy.
Supports [Crossbow] [Ammunition] Skills, granting a chance to not consume a Bolt when firing.
Supports [Crossbow] [Ammunition] Skills, causing them to Reload bolts significantly faster.
Supports [Crossbow] Skills, granting them more damage for each bolt reloaded by that Skill in the last 6 seconds.
Supports skills which create [Minion|Minions], causing your skills which can target [Minion|Minions] to prioritise targeting [Minion|Minions] from the Supported Skill.
Supports [Melee] [Attack|Attacks] which create fissures in the ground, causing them to create additional fissures at the cost of damage and attack speed.
Supports Skills that create Ground Surfaces, causing those surfaces to last longer.
Supports any Skill which creates [Projectile|Projectiles], giving those [Projectile|Projectiles] a chance to [Chain] when impacting terrain.
Supports Skills which place [Totem|Totems], causing those skills to place [Totem|Totems] much more quickly.
Supports Skills which fire [Grenade|Grenades], causing those [Grenade|Grenades] to have much higher duration and damage.
Supports Skills which fire [Grenade|Grenades], giving fired [Grenade|Grenades] a chance to activate again, but lengthening their cooldowns.
Supports Skills which apply [Exposure] to Enemies, increasing the effect of applied [Exposure].
Supports Skills which create [Totem|Totems]. [Totem|Totems] created by Supported Skills have additional [ElementalDamage|Elemental] [Resistances].
Supports [Spell] Skills that [HitDamage|Hit] Enemies and you cast yourself, boosting Damage at the cost of Cast Speed.
Supports [Spell] Skills that fire [Projectile|Projectiles]. Supported Skills have a chance to fire many additional [Projectile|Projectiles] in a circle.
Supports any Skill which creates [IceCrystals|Ice Crystals], causing them to be created with lower Life.
Supports any Skill which creates [IceCrystals|Ice Crystals], causing them to be created with higher Life.
Supports Skills which deal Damage, increasing the maximum [Physical] Damage of their [HitDamage|Hits].
Supports Skills which deal Damage, raising [ElementalDamage|Elemental Damage] dealt for each Skill used [Recently] of a different [ElementalDamage|Elemental] type. Cannot support [Minion] Skills.

Supports [Spell] Skills. Using supported [Spell|Spells] will cause you to [Sacrifice] a portion of your Life on use, gaining extra [Chaos] Damage in exchange. Does not support [Persistent] Skills, [Minion] Skills, or [Trigger|Triggered] Skills.
Supports [Nova] Skills, causing those Skills to take place at the targeted location when used instead of around you.
Supports [Strike] Skills. Supported Skills have a chance to build additional [Combo] on [HitDamage|Hit]. Cannot support Skills used by [Minion|Minions].
Supports Skills which [HitDamage|Hit] Enemies. Supported Skills gain increased [Critical|chance to Critically Hit] against [Immobilised] Enemies.

Supports [Melee] [Attack] Skills. Supported Skills gain [Combo] when you successfully [Strike] Enemies with other [Melee] [Attack|Attacks]. Supported Skills reset their [Combo] on use, dealing more Damage the higher [Combo] you had on use. Cannot support skills which already gain [Combo]. Cannot Support Skills used by [Minion|Minions].

Supports Skills that you use yourself. Supported Skills will consume a [Charges|Power Charge] on use if possible, and will be much more likely to [Critical|Critically Hit] if they do. Supported Skills cannot generate [Charges|Power Charges].
Supports any Skill that you use yourself, granting it significantly higher Area of Effect but causing it to gain a long cooldown. Cannot support Skills which already have a cooldown.

Supports any damaging Skill that you use yourself, granting it significantly higher chance to [Critical|Critically Hit], but causing it to gain a long cooldown. Cannot support Skills which already have a cooldown.

Supports any damaging Skill that you use yourself, granting it significantly higher chance to inflict [Ailments] on hit, but causing it to gain a long cooldown. Cannot support Skills which already have a cooldown.
Supports [Meta] Skills. Supported Skills gain a chance to partially Refund a portion of [Energy] cost when [Trigger|Triggering] or [Invoke|Invoking] other Skills.

Supports Skills that you use yourself. Supported Skills will consume a [Charges|Frenzy Charge] on use if possible, and will gain significant [SkillSpeed|Skill Speed] if they do. Supported Skills cannot generate [Charges|Frenzy Charges].
Supports [Offering] Skills. Supported Skills [Sacrifice] a portion of your life on use, but deal much more damage and have more powerful [Buff|Buffs] in return.

Supports [Offering] Skills. Supported Skills have increased [Buff] effect and deal more damage, but will target an additional skeletal [Minion] when cast. If there is not an additional skeletal [Minion] to target, no damage or [Buff] effect will be granted.
Supports Invocation Skills which [Trigger] other Skills. Supported Skills have significantly higher Maximum [Energy].
Supports [Meta] Skills. Supported Skills generate [Energy] significantly faster.
Supports [Minion] Skills. Supported [Minion|Minions] deal significantly more damage with their Command Skills.
Supports [Slam] Skills you use yourself. Supported Skills gain multiple independent chances to cause [Aftershock|Aftershocks], but deal less Damage.
